text: tum log to khuda ko chhodakar bas un chand naamon hee ko parasatish karate ho jin ko tumane aur tumhaare baap daadaon ne gadh liya hai khuda ne unake lie koee daleel nahin naazil kee hukoomat to bas khuda hee ke vaaste khaas hai usane to hukm diya hai ki usake siva kisee kee ibaadat na karo yahee saaeedha deen hai magar (aphasos) bahutere log nahin jaanate hain
